comments:
I've downloaded the current source for the JDNC open source project (https://jdnc.dev.java.net/) via 
CVS into three separate Eclipse projects:
    jdnc
    databinding
    swingx

I get the following error from the SQLDataProvider class in the databinding subproject.

Internal compiler error

Could you please specify the build id?

From "About Eclipse Platform"

Version: 3.1.0
Build id: I20050527-1300

Your build is not the 3.1 final release.
Here is the build id of the 3.1 release.
Version: 3.1.0
Build id: I20050627-1435

So could you please try with the 3.1 release?
Thanks.

Could not reproduce with latest 3.1.1 build.
Closing as WORKSFORME.
Please reopen if you get it again with a more recent build.

OK, downloaded:

Version: 3.1.0
Build id: I20050627-1435

And the problem did go away when I forced recompilation.

In my defense, there was nothing in the I20050527-1300 "Help | About" text to indicate that it was not 
the final version (No M or RC designation), so excuse me for not realizing that Version 3.1.0 
I20050527-1300 was not really a 3.1 release.  Perhaps, next time you could be clear in what you are 
asking people like me (those not intimately familiar with the build and release schedule) to do rather 
than being snide/superior when you are forced to spell it out.

Glad it is fixed.
I never tried to be superior.
